t: Psalm 103
Praise for the Lord’s Mercies
A Psalm of David.
Bless*pn the Lord,*s O my soul; And*ld all that is within me, bless*i His holy name!
Bless*ld the Lord,*s O my soul, And*ld forget not all His benefits:
Who*ld forgives all your iniquities, Who*ld heals all your diseases,
Who*ld redeems your life from destruction, Who*ld crowns you with lovingkindness and tender mercies,
Who*ld satisfies your mouth with good things,*i So*ild that*i your youth is renewed like the eagle’s.
The*ln Lord*s executes righteousness And*ld justice for all who are oppressed.
He*ld made known His ways to Moses, His*ld acts to the children of Israel.
The*ld Lord*s is*i merciful and gracious, Slow*ld to anger, and abounding in mercy.
He*ld will not always strive with*i us,*i Nor*ld will He keep His*i anger*i forever.
He*ld has not dealt with us according to our sins, Nor*ld punished us according to our iniquities.
For*ln as the heavens are high above the earth, So*ild great is His mercy toward those who fear Him;
As*ld far as the east is from the west, So*ild far has He removed our transgressions from us.
As*ld a father pities his*i children, So*ild the Lord*s pities those who fear Him.
For*ld He knows our frame; He*ld remembers that we are*i dust.
As*iln for*i man, his days are*i like grass; As*ld a flower of the field, so he flourishes.
For*ld the wind passes over it, and it is gone, And*ld its place remembers it no more.
But*ld the mercy of the Lord*s is*i from everlasting to everlasting On*ld those who fear Him, And*ld His righteousness to children’s children,
To*ld such as keep His covenant, And*ld to those who remember His commandments to do them.
The*ln Lord*s has established His throne in heaven, And*ld His kingdom rules over all.
Bless*ln the Lord,*s you His angels, Who*ld excel in strength, who do His word, Heeding*ld the voice of His word.
Bless*ld the Lord,*s all you*i His hosts, You*ild ministers of His, who do His pleasure.
Bless*ld the Lord,*s all His works, In*ld all places of His dominion. Bless*ln the Lord,*s O my soul!
